alert.note: Alert for Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 6:21PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT EASTERN ESCAMBIA...SOUTHEASTERN CONECUH...SOUTHWESTERN COVINGTON...NORTHWESTERN OKALOOSA AND NORTHEASTERN SANTA ROSA COUNTIES THROUGH 600 PM CDT... At 520 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 11 miles east of East Brewton, or 11 miles east of Brewton, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Castleberry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
